'''1.7.8'''<ref>{{cite|url=https://mojang.com/2014/04/minecraft-1-7-6/|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://mojang.com/2014/04/minecraft-1-7-6/|title=Minecraft 1.7.8|author=Searge|website=Mojang.com|date=April 9, 2014}}</ref> is a minor update to {{JE}} released on April 11, 2014,<ref name=dinnerbone>{{tweet|Dinnerbone|454570996201431041|Minecraft 1.7.8 is out and available in your launchers. It fixes a few crashes and issues where skins weren't loading.|April 11, 2014}}</ref> to fix some crashes and skin issues from [[Java Edition 1.7.7]].<ref name=dinnerbone/> It is compatible with [[Java_Edition_1.7.6|1.7.6]] – [[Java_Edition_1.7.7|1.7.7]] servers.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Server]]s'''
* Client auto-kicks the player from the server after one day.<ref name=grum>https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-52755?focusedCommentId=150576&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-150576</ref>

'''Twitch streaming'''
* Now asks for confirmation before starting streaming to avoid accidental broadcasts.
